item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

read the rules;

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

if you have a SPECIFIC question about the packet we will be glad to give an overview of what is needed but we will not do it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

src>server>model>players>packets

Under

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) { int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA(); c.getInStream().readUnsignedByte(); c.getInStream().readUnsignedByte(); int slot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
(Should look something like that)
Add

if(c.playerRights == 2) { c.sendMessage("Admins cannot drop items!"); return; }
